name: Camera Person!
description:
Timelapse!

Here's a game I made for the Jam! :)

Controls: W,A,D and R to restart level.

Notes:

I started it really late so only worked on it for the last day of the jam sadly! I would've liked to add music and make some better puzzles (with things like gravity guns!)... ;_;

For some reason after building it to WebGL a lot of the sprites were really compressed, sorry! Also there are some random lines but didn't have the time to fix them either  :[

Font used: https://www.1001fonts.com/joystix-font.html#character-map
